apiInfo.title: Hadba API
apiInfo.description: The REST APIs implementation for the `hadba` WebApp. This is the `v5` revision, a complete rewrite in **nodejs**. The reason for the rewrite is to make it platform agnostic and an get it **SaaS** ready. You can play with the APIs by generating an access token [here](../) and putting in the top right of this page, the token will give you only read access. The data here might be changing everytime as this the staging server and I'll be playing with this too. Collaboration are welcomed.
